Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.1: Understand a global perspective on the textiles and soft goods industries.
Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.2: Engage with the multiple processes within the product development cycle.
Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.3: Have knowledge of textile and apparel design and development, merchandising, science and communications.
Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.4: Be aware of cultural, behavioral, historical and aesthetic dimensions of textiles and apparel.
Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.5: Communicate ideas clearly and effectively in oral, visual and written forms.
Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design.6: Use technologies relevant to the soft goods industries.
